title: Emerald & Diamond Floral Cascade Necklace - A Timeless Vaddanam Inspiration
materials: Tanzanite Cabochons. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This necklace reimagines the traditional Vaddanam (waist belt) aesthetic into a stunning cascade necklace. Features a central, meticulously bezel-set Zambian Emerald, flanked by a floral motif crafted from round brilliant cut diamonds. Accents of vibrant Tanzanite cabochons add depth and character. The openwork design allows light to beautifully refract through each stone. Delicate diamond-studded paisley motifs dangle gracefully, creating a captivating cascade effect.
occasions: or as a cherished heirloom piece. Ideal for Sangeeth
description: This exquisite necklace masterfully blends traditional South Indian design cues with contemporary sensibilities. The use of natural, high-quality gemstones ensures lasting brilliance and value. The delicate, handcrafted detailing showcases exceptional artistry. Its unique design makes it a versatile piece, suitable for both grand occasions and elegant evenings. A true statement of sophisticated style and timeless beauty.
